Package it.polimi.ingsw.bean.options

Class Options

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.bean.options.Options
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseOptions, GodOptions, MessageOption, SetupOptions, TileOptions 
public abstract class Options
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Options are sent by the server to every client, the user identified by the variable nickname is the one that has to perform some operation indicated by the Options object. The latter contains also the valid operations the user can perform.
See Also:
Serialized Form
